concept.definition: Query response to be sent as an HL7 Batch.
Query response to occur in real time.
Query response to sent as a series of responses at the same time without the use of batch formatting.

description:
Defines the timing and grouping of the response instances.  OpenIssue:
Description copied from Concept Domain of same name.  Must be verified.
name: v3.ResponseModality

text.div:
Release Date: 2018-08-12

LevelCodeDisplayDefinition
1B Batch Query response to be sent as an HL7 Batch.
1R Real Time Query response to occur in real time.
1T Bolus Query response to sent as a series of responses at the same time without the use of batch formatting.

title: v3 Code System ResponseModality
